drinks.name: margarita
steps: Rim the glass with lime and dip it in salt.
Fill a shaker with ice.
Add tequila, triple sec, and lime juice.
Shake well and strain into the glass.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: mojito
ingredients: Mint sprig and lime wedge for garnish
steps: Muddle mint leaves and sugar in a glass.
Fill the glass with ice.
Add lime juice and rum.
Top with soda water.
Stir gently and garnish with a mint sprig and lime wedge.

drinks.name: piña colada
ingredients: Pineapple slice and cherry for garnish
steps: Combine rum, pineapple juice, and coconut cream in a blender with ice.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a glass.
Garnish with a pineapple slice and cherry.

drinks.name: cosmopolitan
ingredients: Lime wedge or twist for garnish
steps: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with a lime wedge or twist.

drinks.name: bloody mary
ingredients: Celery stick and lemon wedge for garnish
steps: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco sauce, salt, and pepper.
Shake gently and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a celery stick and lemon wedge.

drinks.name: whiskey sour
ingredients: Cherry and orange slice for garnish
steps: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add whiskey, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white (if using).
Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a cherry and orange slice.

drinks.name: mai tai
steps: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add white rum, dark rum, orange curaçao, orgeat syrup, and lime juice.
Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a mint sprig.

drinks.name: old fashioned
steps: Place the sugar cube in an Old Fashioned glass.
Saturate with bitters, add a dash of water, and muddle until dissolved.
Fill the glass with ice cubes and add the whiskey.
Stir gently and garnish with an orange twist.

drinks.name: daiquiri
steps: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add rum, lime juice, and simple syrup.
Shake well and strain into a chilled glass.
Garnish with a lime twist.

drinks.name: pina colada mocktail
ingredients: Pineapple slice and cherry for garnish
steps: Combine pineapple juice and coconut cream in a blender with ice.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a glass.
Garnish with a pineapple slice and cherry.

drinks.name: virgin mojito
ingredients: Mint sprig and lime wedge for garnish
steps: Muddle mint leaves and sugar in a glass.
Fill the glass with ice.
Add lime juice.
Top with soda water.
Stir gently and garnish with a mint sprig and lime wedge.

drinks.name: virgin mary
ingredients: Celery stick and lemon wedge for garnish
steps: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add tomato juice, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco sauce, salt, and pepper.
Shake gently and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a celery stick and lemon wedge.

drinks.name: shirley temple
steps: Fill a glass with ice.
Add ginger ale and grenadine.
Stir gently and garnish with a cherry.

drinks.name: nojito
ingredients: Mint sprig and lime wedge for garnish
steps: Muddle mint leaves and sugar in a glass.
Fill the glass with ice.
Add lime juice.
Top with soda water.
Stir gently and garnish with a mint sprig and lime wedge.

drinks.name: cinderella
ingredients: Orange slice and cherry for garnish
steps: Fill a glass with ice.
Add orange juice, pineapple juice, lemon juice, and grenadine.
Top with soda water.
Stir gently and garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

drinks.name: fruit punch
ingredients: Orange slice and cherry for garnish
steps: Fill a glass with ice.
Add orange juice, pineapple juice, lemon juice, and grenadine.
Top with soda water.
Stir gently and garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

drinks.name: arnold palmer
steps: Fill a glass with ice.
Add iced tea and lemonade.
Stir gently and garnish with a lemon wedge.

drinks.name: sparkling lemonade
steps: Fill a glass with ice.
Add lemon juice and simple syrup.
Top with soda water.
Stir gently and garnish with a lemon slice.

drinks.name: virgin piña colada
ingredients: Pineapple slice and cherry for garnish
steps: Combine pineapple juice and coconut cream in a blender with ice.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a glass.
Garnish with a pineapple slice and cherry.

drinks.name: lemon lime bitters
steps: Fill a glass with ice.
Add lemonade and lime cordial.
Add a dash of Angostura bitters.
Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: spicy margarita
steps: Rim the glass with lime and dip it in salt.
Fill a shaker with ice.
Add tequila, triple sec, lime juice, and jalapeño slices.
Shake well and strain into the glass.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: jalapeño martini
steps: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add vodka, dry vermouth, and jalapeño slices.
Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with an olive.

drinks.name: habanero daiquiri
steps: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add rum, lime juice, simple syrup, and habanero slice.
Shake well and strain into a chilled glass.
Garnish with a lime twist.

drinks.name: spicy bloody mary
ingredients: Celery stick and lemon wedge for garnish
steps: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco sauce, salt, and pepper.
Shake gently and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a celery stick and lemon wedge.

drinks.name: spicy ginger ale
steps: Fill a glass with ice.
Add ginger ale, lime juice, and jalapeño slices.
Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: fireball cocktail
steps: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add Fireball, apple juice, and lemon juice.
Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with an apple slice.

drinks.name: spicy mule
steps: Fill a glass with ice.
Add vodka, lime juice, ginger beer, and jalapeño slices.
Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: spicy pineapple mojito
ingredients: Mint sprig and pineapple slice for garnish
steps: Muddle mint leaves, jalapeño slices, and sugar in a glass.
Fill the glass with ice.
Add rum, pineapple juice, and lime juice.
Top with soda water.
Stir gently and garnish with a mint sprig and pineapple slice.

drinks.name: chili pepper cocktail
steps: Rim the glass with lime and dip it in salt.
Fill a shaker with ice.
Add tequila, triple sec, lime juice, and chili pepper slices.
Shake well and strain into the glass.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: spicy watermelon lemonade
steps: Fill a glass with ice.
Add watermelon juice, lemon juice, simple syrup, and jalapeño slices.
Stir gently and garnish with a watermelon slice.

drinks.name: spicy cucumber cooler
steps: Fill a glass with ice.
Add cucumber juice, lime juice, and jalapeño slices.
Stir gently and garnish with a cucumber slice.

drinks.name: spicy mango margarita
steps: Rim the glass with lime and dip it in salt.
Fill a shaker with ice.
Add tequila, mango puree, lime juice, and jalapeño slices.
Shake well and strain into the glass.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: spicy cranberry cocktail
steps: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add vodka, cranberry juice, lime juice, and jalapeño slices.
Shake well and strain into a chilled glass.
Garnish with a lime twist.

drinks.name: spicy tequila sunrise
ingredients: Orange slice and cherry for garnish
steps: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add tequila, orange juice, and jalapeño slices.
Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Slowly pour grenadine to create the sunrise effect.
Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

drinks.name: spicy basil lemonade
ingredients: Lemon wheel and basil sprig for garnish
steps: Muddle basil leaves and jalapeño slices in a shaker.
Add vodka, lemon juice, simple syrup, and ice.
Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lemon wheel and basil sprig.

drinks.name: spicy lime cooler
steps: Fill a shaker with ice.
Add vodka, lime juice, simple syrup, and jalapeño slices.
Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lime wedge.
